alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 11:33AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND SOUTH CENTRAL PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 1133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Bellflower, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Olney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
